languages.text: "Леди Вистенца свершила некую... медитацию, после чего собрала всех самых умелых слуг. Сейчас ее дружина вооружается, чтобы нанести удар в сердце катаклизма. Она передала послание, что "свершить эту расправу будет для нее великим Удовольствием". Да, с большой буквы, возможно это какой-то шифр".

"Lady Vistenza has conducted some sort of... meditation, afterward gathering all her most skilled servants. Now her squad arms itself to strike a blow at the heart of the cataclysm. She has sent a message saying that 'it would be a great Pleasure for her to carry out this retribution.' The word 'Pleasure' was written with a capital letter — perhaps it is some kind of cipher."
languages.original_text: "Леди Вистенца свершила некую... медитацию, после чего собрала всех самых умелых слуг. Сейчас ее дружина вооружается, чтобы нанести удар в сердце катаклизма. Она передала послание, что "свершить эту расправу будет для нее великим Удовольствием". Да, с большой буквы, возможно это какой-то шифр".

traits.locale_text: "Lady Vistenza has conducted some sort of... meditation, and then she gathered all her most skilled servants. Now her squad is arming to strike a blow at the heart of cataclysm. She has sent a message that 'it would be a great Pleasure for her to accomplish this reprisal'. Yes, with a capital letter — perhaps it is some kind of cipher."

"Lady Vistenza has conducted some sort of... meditation, and then she gathered all her most skilled servants. Now her squad is arming to strike a blow at the heart of cataclysm. She has sent a message that 'it would be a great Pleasure for her to accomplish this reprisal'. Yes, with a capital letter — perhaps it is some kind of cipher."

languages.text: “维丝坦萨女士进行了某种……冥想，之后召集了她最为训练有素的仆人。此时此刻，她的小队已经全副武装，正在攻击灾难的中心地带。她传达了一则信息，说对她而言，执行这样的惩罚会带来极大的‘愉悦’。‘愉悦’这个词下面划着线，或许是某种暗号。”
languages.original_text: "Lady Vistenza has conducted some sort of... meditation, afterward gathering all her most skilled servants. Now her squad arms itself to strike a blow at the heart of the cataclysm. She has sent a message saying that 'it would be a great Pleasure for her to carry out this retribution.' The word 'Pleasure' was written with a capital letter — perhaps it is some kind of cipher."

traits.locale_text: “维丝坦萨女士进行了某种……冥想，之后召集了她最为训练有素的仆人。此时此刻，她的小队已经全副武装，正在攻击灾难的中心地带。她传达了一则信息，说对她而言，执行这样的惩罚会带来极大的‘愉悦’。‘愉悦’这个词下面划着线，或许是某种暗号。”
“维丝坦萨女士进行了某种……冥想，之后召集了她最为训练有素的仆人。此时此刻，她的小队已经全副武装，正在攻击灾难的中心地带。她传达了一则信息，说对她而言，执行这样的惩罚会带来极大的‘愉悦’。没错，‘愉悦’这个词下面划着线，或许是某种暗号。”

languages.text: «Lady Vistenza ha llevado a cabo una especie de... meditación, y después ha reunido a sus sirvientes más competentes. Ahora su escuadrón se prepara para asestar un golpe al corazón del cataclismo. Ha enviado un mensaje diciendo que "sería un gran Placer llevar a cabo esta venganza". La palabra "Placer" estaba escrita con mayúscula; tal vez sea algún tipo de código».
languages.original_text: "Lady Vistenza has conducted some sort of... meditation, afterward gathering all her most skilled servants. Now her squad arms itself to strike a blow at the heart of the cataclysm. She has sent a message saying that 'it would be a great Pleasure for her to carry out this retribution.' The word 'Pleasure' was written with a capital letter — perhaps it is some kind of cipher."

traits.locale_text: «Lady Vistenza ha llevado a cabo una especie de... meditación, y después ha reunido a sus sirvientes más competentes. Ahora su escuadrón se prepara para asestar un golpe al corazón del cataclismo. Ha enviado un mensaje diciendo que "sería un gran Placer llevar a cabo esta venganza". La palabra "Placer" estaba escrita con mayúscula; tal vez sea algún tipo de código».

languages.text: 「レディ・ヴィステンツァはある種の...瞑想を行った後、最も経験豊富な従者を集めたのだ。今、彼女の分隊は、大惨事の中心に攻撃を加えようと武装している。彼女は 'この報復を実行することは、自身にとって大きな快楽だ 'というメッセージを送ってきた。'快楽'は大文字で書いているから...ある種の暗号なのかもしれないな」
languages.original_text: "Lady Vistenza has conducted some sort of... meditation, afterward gathering all her most skilled servants. Now her squad arms itself to strike a blow at the heart of the cataclysm. She has sent a message saying that 'it would be a great Pleasure for her to carry out this retribution.' The word 'Pleasure' was written with a capital letter — perhaps it is some kind of cipher."

traits.locale_text: 「レディ・ヴィステンツァはある種の...瞑想を行った後、最も経験豊富な従者を集めたのだ。今、彼女の分隊は、大惨事の中心に攻撃を加えようと武装している。彼女は 'この報復を実行することは、自身にとって大きな喜びだ 'というメッセージを送ってきた。ああ、大文字を使っているから...ある種の暗号なのかもしれないな」
「レディ・ヴィステンツァはある種の...瞑想を行った後、最も経験豊富な従者を集めたのだ。今、彼女の分隊は、大惨事の中心に攻撃を加えようと武装している。彼女は 'この報復を実行することは、自身にとって大きな喜びだ 'というメッセージを送ってきた。ああ、大文字を使っているから...ある種の暗号なのかもしれないな」

languages.text: « Dame Vistenza s'est plongée dans une sorte de... méditation, puis elle a fait appeler ses serviteurs les plus chevronnés. Le groupe ainsi formé a pris les armes et s'apprête à frapper à l'épicentre de la catastrophe. Elle nous a fait savoir que c'était pour elle "un immense Plaisir de faire appliquer cette sentence". Plaisir avec une majuscule... C'est peut-être une sorte de message codé. »
languages.original_text: "Lady Vistenza has conducted some sort of... meditation, afterward gathering all her most skilled servants. Now her squad arms itself to strike a blow at the heart of the cataclysm. She has sent a message saying that 'it would be a great Pleasure for her to carry out this retribution.' The word 'Pleasure' was written with a capital letter — perhaps it is some kind of cipher."

traits.locale_text: « Dame Vistenza s'est plongée dans une sorte de... méditation, puis elle a fait appeler ses serviteurs les plus chevronnés. Le groupe ainsi formé a pris les armes et s'apprête à frapper à l'épicentre de la catastrophe. Elle nous a fait savoir que c'était pour elle "un immense Plaisir de faire appliquer cette sentence". Plaisir avec une majuscule... C'est peut-être une sorte de message codé. »

languages.text: "Lady Vistenza hat eine Art ... Meditation durchgeführt und danach ihre fähigsten Diener versammelt. Nun bewaffnet sich ihr Trupp, um einen Schlag gegen das Herz des Kataklysmus auszuführen. Sie hat die Botschaft geschickt, wonach es ihr 'eine große Freude wäre, diese Vergeltungsmaßnahme durchzuführen'. Das Wort 'Freude' war in Großbuchstaben geschrieben. Vielleicht ist das ein Art Code."
languages.original_text: "Lady Vistenza has conducted some sort of... meditation, afterward gathering all her most skilled servants. Now her squad arms itself to strike a blow at the heart of the cataclysm. She has sent a message saying that 'it would be a great Pleasure for her to carry out this retribution.' The word 'Pleasure' was written with a capital letter — perhaps it is some kind of cipher."

traits.locale_text: "Lady Vistenza hat eine Art ... Meditation durchgeführt und danach ihre fähigsten Diener versammelt. Nun bewaffnet sich ihr Trupp, um einen Schlag gegen das Herz des Kataklysmus auszuführen. Sie hat die Botschaft geschickt, wonach es ihr 'eine große Freude wäre, diese Vergeltungsmaßnahme durchzuführen'. Das Wort 'Freude' war in Großbuchstaben geschrieben. Vielleicht ist das ein Art Code."

"Lady Vistenza hat eine Art ... Meditation durchgeführt und danach ihre fähigsten Diener versammelt. Nun bewaffnet sich ihr Trupp, um einen Schlag gegen das Herz des Kataklysmus auszuführen. Sie hat die Botschaft geschickt, dass es ihr 'ein großes VERGNÜGEN wäre, diese Vergeltung durchzuführen'. Ja, in Großbuchstaben. Vielleicht ist es ein Code."

languages.text: "Leydi Vistenza, bir tür... Meditasyon yürüttü. Ardından en yetenekli hizmetkârlarını topladı. Şimdiyse mangası, felaketin kalbine bir darbe indirmek için silahlanıyor. Gönderdiği mesajda 'Bu intikamı almak, benim için büyük bir Zevk olacak.' yazmış. Evet, 'Zevk' sözcüğü büyük harfle başlıyor. Belki de bir tür koddur."
languages.original_text: "Lady Vistenza has conducted some sort of... meditation, afterward gathering all her most skilled servants. Now her squad arms itself to strike a blow at the heart of the cataclysm. She has sent a message saying that 'it would be a great Pleasure for her to carry out this retribution.' The word 'Pleasure' was written with a capital letter — perhaps it is some kind of cipher."
